This project highlights the code and outputs of a project visualizing the number of refugees to the US that was completed as an assignment for Dr. Andrew Heiss' Data Visualization course.

<!--more-->

The full report can be viewed here:

```{r echo=FALSE, out.height="500", out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics('refugee-code.pdf')
```

The final visualization was created using Canva and the plot outputs from R

```{r echo=FALSE, out.height="500", out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics('refugee-final-image.pdf')
```
